## Required Images
- Dark abstract background with soft geometric shapes and a glowing amber/gold gradient focal point, suitable for a coming soon page (coming-soon-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)

existing_features.title: Create a visually engaging 'Coming Soon' / 'Under Construction' landing page that informs visitors the website is being built and will be available soon.

Apply a bold, modern visual theme with a dark background, vibrant accent colors (e.g., amber/gold or teal), elegant typography, and subtle animated elements (e.g., a pulsing icon or fade-in text) to create a polished first impression. Enforce this theme consistently across all page elements.
